title: MPESB Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 464 Pharmacist and Other Posts
description: The Madhya Pradesh Employees Selection Board (MPESB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 464 Pharmacist, Physiotherapist, Counselor, and Ophthalmic Assistant Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their BPT, D. Pharm, Diploma, Post-graduation, and 12th can apply for the MPESB Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode....
